resources.string:
These times ensure you'll rise at the end of a 90-minute sleep cycle. 

 A good night's sleep consists of 5-6 complete sleep cycles. 

 (This is taking into consideration that it takes 15 minutes to fall asleep.)

These times ensure you'll rise at the end of a 90-minute sleep cycle. 

 A good night's sleep consists of 5-6 complete sleep cycles. 

 (Tthis is taking into consideration that it takes 15 minutes and 24 hours to fall asleep.)
